scope: Governs incorporation, management, and winding up of companies in India

private_company.definition: Section 2(68) - Company with minimum 2 and maximum 200 members
features: Cannot invite public to subscribe shares
Can commence business immediately after incorporation

public_company.definition: Section 2(71) - Company with minimum 7 members, no maximum limit
features: Can invite public to subscribe shares
Cannot commence business until certificate of commencement obtained

one_person_company.definition: Section 2(62) - Company with only one member
features: Member can be individual or nominee

incorporation_process.step_3: Reserve company name through RUN service

board_of_directors.Section_149: Minimum directors: 3 for public, 2 for private

share_capital.Section_61: Power of limited company to alter its share capital
share_capital.Section_68: Power of company to purchase its own securities

winding_up.Section_304: Winding up of company on report of Registrar
